title: Trump to award Charlie Kirk the Presidential Medal of Freedom
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will award Charlie Kirk posthumously the Presidential Medal of Freedom.

title: After Charlie Kirk killing, Trump assassination plot trial begins
shortDescription: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk’s assassination looms as Ryan Routh, accused of plotting to kill Donald Trump, faces trial in Florida.

title: Belarus releases 52 prisoners after Trump appeal, US embassy says
shortDescription: It was the biggest batch of prisoners pardoned by Lukashenko, who is seeking to repair relations with the United States after years of isolation.

title: Poll finds Americans uneasy at Trump's presidential power moves
shortDescription: A Reuters-Ipsos poll found a big majority of the public favors limits on presidential power and does not approve of Trump’s efforts to shatter norms.

title: Qatar bombing tests the limits of the Trump-Netanyahu alliance
shortDescription: Less than four months ago, President Donald Trump met with the leader of Qatar, signing a sweeping defense agreement with the key ally.

title: After 9/11, America had the world's support. Trump changed that.
shortDescription: From Argentina to the former Yugoslavia, even in Moscow, the world stood with the U.S. after 9/11. Trump and time have changed that.

title: Trump orders flags to be lowered following Kirk assassination
shortDescription: The lowering of the flags follow the fatal shooting of the conservative influencer in Utah Sept. 10.

title: Trump speaks on Charlie Kirk’s death
shortDescription: President Trump mourned Charlie Kirk’s death at Utah Valley University and blamed radical left violence.

title: 'Like a little brother to me,' Trump Jr. in praise of Charlie Kirk
shortDescription: Donald Trump Jr. praises slain conservative leader Charlie Kirk in touching X post as "one of the most courageous, principled men I’ve ever known."

title: Trump vows vengeance against 'radical Left' for Charlie Kirk slaying
shortDescription: Trump, saying he was 'filled with grief and anger,' vowed in a taped address to 'find each and every one of those who contributed to this atrocity.'

title: Charlie Kirk, Donald Trump fueled each other's political rise
shortDescription: Charlie Kirk wasn't a Trump aide and didn't have a college degree, but his political movement brought young voters to GOP to fuel Trump's rise.

title: Harris calls letting Biden decide 2024 run 'recklessness' in new book
shortDescription: Kamala Harris says in her new memoir that it was a mistake to leave the decision up to former President Joe Biden on whether to run in 2024.

title: 'Heart of the Youth': Trump, Vance react to death of Charlie Kirk
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and other major leaders issued outpourings following the shooting of conservative youth leader Charlie Kirk.

title: A Trump third term? Two Supreme Court justices sound skeptical
shortDescription: Two Supreme Court justices suggested recently that President Donald Trump is probably prohibited by the Constitution from running for a third term.
